name: Streaming Ingestion PubSub to BQ
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads JSON encoded messages from Pub/Sub, executes a simple UDF, and writes the results to a BigQuery table

parameters.name: udfclassName
parameters.label: FQN of a Java class name.
parameters.helpText: A class name which implements the UDF interface and will be used to transform data before ingestion.

parameters.name: outputTable
parameters.label: BigQuery output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table spec to write to, in the form 'project:dataset.table'.
